Volvo Car Corporation (Volvo Cars) grants You (the user) a limited, non-exclusive, non-sublicensable, non-transferable, revocable license to use, reproduce, create derivative works and use the 3D models of cars manufactured by Volvo Cars available on the Unity Hub (Licensed Content).  You agree not to remove any copyright or proprietary notices or use the Licensed Content in any matter or for any purpose that infringes, misappropriates, or otherwise violates  any intellectual property or intellectual property right or other right of any person.  You further agree not to use the Licensed Content for commercial use, or to use it to develop a competing product or service.  You agree to promptly take down any derivative works of the Licensed Content if Volvo Cars or Unity provides you written notice to do so.
